Text: Your Thoughts on Distributed EnergyMr Steve Harris Regional Vice President Transwestern Pipeline Company Dear Mr Harris Recently there has been a lot of discussion and confusion on the direction of the distributed energy DE industry With the summer stock price collapse and slow market development many DE stakeholders are rethinking their strategies Cambridge Energy Research Associates CERA is as well In an effort to provide you with the most uptodate valued information CERA is asking each member of our Distributed Energy Advisory Service to complete a brief survey so that we may better serve you The survey can be found at the following link surveydistributed This survey is anonymous and all comments are welcome We plan to present and discuss the results at our Executive Retreat in Santa Fe New Mexico December Thank you for your time and we appreciate your input Sincerely Steven Taub Director Distributed Energy Our relationship with you is very important to us Should you prefer not to receive email notifications from CERA please send a reply to this message with DoNotEmail as the subject line of your message mailtosubjectDoNotEmail

REMINDER CERA Executive Roundtables in HoustonCERA Members and Friends We wanted to make sure you had seen our announcement regarding a series of Executive Roundtables in Houston next week on April and These meetings will feature presentations and interactive discussions with CERA experts For complete details on the events please visit event The events will feature speakers from the following CERA teams North American Electric Power April North American Natural Gas April two events Western Energy April Latin America Energy April Asia Pacific Energy April Location and Accommodations The Four Seasons Hotel Lamar Street Houston TX Tel Fax Please contact the hotel directly for room reservations To enroll please complete the form found on our website at event and return it by fax to CERA Registration CERA University Road Cambridge MA USA Fax Tel x email mailto Sincerely CERA Event Registration PLEASE NOTE Dates and locations of events are subject to change Participation at a roundtable is a function of the terms of the CERAclient contract For more information about eligibility please contact CERA Registration Our relationship with you is very important to us If you do not wish to receive future email notifications please send a reply to this message with DoNotEmail as the subject of your message mailtosubjectDoNotEmail

CERA Western Energy Summit August Mark Your CalendarMr Jeffrey K Skilling CEO Enron Corp CERA Executive Summit Invitation Special Discount for Members of CERAs Western Energy North American Gas North American Power Global Power Forum Retail Energy Distributed Energy and Transmission Energy Retainer Services RE Balancing Risk and Opportunity Gas and Power Markets Beyond the California Crisis A CERA Executive Summit August La Costa Resort Carlsbad California Dear Mr Skilling Cambridge Energy Research Associates is pleased to extend a special invitation for you to participate in a CERA Executive Summit to be held on August at La Costa Resort in Carlsbad California At the Summit CERA will present its independent forwardlooking scenarios and objective insights on the strategic investment and regulatory challenges for California and Western North America as well as the related implications for other energy markets across North America The latest agenda updates can be found on the CERA Web site at eventcarlsbad This site will be updated regularly to keep you abreast of program developments In keeping with the traditional CERA format the August rd Summit is designed to foster interactive seniorlevel dialogue on the critical choices ahead On the afternoon of the nd the program includes networking activities such as golf a cocktail reception and dinner To facilitate highlevel interactions throughout the Summit CERA is limiting enrollment to senior executives and government officials The Summit will be chaired by CERA Chairman Daniel Yergin and will also feature insightful presentations by our experts on California and electric power including Senior Director Larry Makovich and Director of Western Energy Mike Zenker Summit participants and commentators will include key senior policymakers as well as representatives from CERA client financial distribution generation production and trading companies Your views would be of great interest and we would truly value your participation in the Summit The participation fee is US but we are pleased to extend a special discount of US for members of our Western Energy North American Gas North American Power Global Power Forum Retail Energy Distributed Energy and Electric Power Transmission Advisory Services The Summit agenda and enrollment information can be found on our web site at eventcarlsbad A formal invitation will soon reach you by regular mail To register before receiving this formal invitation please complete the PDF enrollment form on the event Web site and fax it to If you are unable to join us we hope that you will pass on this invitation to an appropriate senior representative within your organization We hope to see you at the Summit Sincerely Ron Kapavik CERA Director North American Energy Our relationship with you is very important to us Should you prefer not to receive email notifications from CERA please send a reply to this message with DoNotEmail as the subject line of your message mailtosubjectDoNotEmail
